author: Flick Connection

Looking for new movies on Prime Video that are actually worth watching? In this video, I’m breaking down the latest movies added to Prime Video, including a mix of big studio releases, overlooked gems, and some insanely good genre flicks.

From fast paced crime thrillers like Blackhat and Out of Time, to sci-fi and spectacle with The Creator and Alien: Romulus, this list covers a wide range of new Prime Video additions. You’ll also find strong character-driven films like The Iron Claw, cult favorites like Blade II, and a few 2025 surprises that flew under the radar when they first released last year. If you’re scrolling endlessly and wondering what to watch on Prime Video right now, this spoiler-free guide is designed to save you time and surface the best recent additions—all in one place.

Thanks for watchi
title: OOPS! Prime Just Accidentally Added 12 Criminally Good Movies
